casename: Lee Huay Kok v Attorney General
counsel: Hri Kumar and Ajay Advani (Drew & Napier LLC) for the applicant; Eric Chin (Attorney General's Chambers) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Companies/Directors/Disqualification/Disqualification to act as director on conviction for corruption/Application to court for leave to act as director or take part in management in applicant's company/Application two years and nine months after conviction and disqualification/Court's jurisdiction to grant leave where disqualification arises under s 154(1) and not s 154(2)/ss 154(1), 154(2), 154(3) & 154(6) Companies Act (Cap 50, 1994 Ed)
